quote: I can no other answer make but thanks, and thanks, and ever thanks.
author: William Shakespeare

quote: We often take for granted the very things that most deserve our gratitude.
author: Cynthia Ozick

quote: As we express our gratitude, we must never forget that the highest appreciation is not to utter words, but to live by them.
author: John F. Kennedy

quote: Appreciation is a wonderful thing: it makes what is excellent in others belong to us as well.
author: Voltaire

quote: The roots of all goodness lie in the soil of appreciation for goodness.
author: Dalai Lama

quote: Hem your blessings with thankfulness so they don’t unravel.
author: Unknown

quote: I would maintain that thanks are the highest form of thought, and that gratitude is happiness doubled by wonder.
author: G.K. Chesterton

quote: Feeling gratitude and not expressing it is like wrapping a present and not giving it.
author: William Arthur Ward

quote: Acknowledging the good that you already have in your life is the foundation for all abundance.
author: Eckhart Tolle

quote: If you want to turn your life around, try thankfulness. It will change your life mightily.
author: Gerald Good

quote: Real friendship is shown in times of trouble; prosperity is full of friends.
author: Euripides

quote: At times our own light goes out and is rekindled by a spark from another person. Each of us has cause to think with deep gratitude of those who have lighted the flame within us.
author: Albert Schweitzer

quote: No one who achieves success does so without acknowledging the help of others.
author: Alfred North Whitehead

quote: What seems insignificant when you have it is important when you need it.
author: Franz Grillparzer

quote: The only people with whom you should try to get even are those who have helped you.
author: John E. Southard

quote: Thank you for accepting me as I am, with my virtues and defects.
author: Jenni Rivera

quote: It’s not where you are in life, it’s who you have by your side that matters.
author: vibhu

quote: So many people have touched my heart and made an impact on my world. I’m thankful for every lesson and learning experience.
author: Bindi Irwin

quote: The older you get, the more you need the people who knew you when you were young.
author: Mary Schmich

quote: We are two among the wild herds spontaneous as any.
author: Walt Whitman
